nodes.text: Chrome Citadel was a run-down space station located in deep space. Once inhabited by asteroid miners, Chrome Citadel was abandoned decades before the Galactic Civil War and eventually became home to underworld types such as smugglers and slavers. In 28 ABY, Chrome Citadel was still inhabited but the piecemeal repairs done to the station's original hull gave the place the appearance that it could fall apart at any moment.
